column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////My girlfriend and I decided to give this establishment a go for their cocktails
column3: I think we were unimpressed. I know they have a wide selection of bourbon and whiskey to choose from
column4: but the old fashioned drink I ordered was mediocre at best. We may give this place another try for their food and other libations. Aside from the drinks
column5: the ambiance and decor inside were lively and well appointed.
